E.Den

Introduction

LC9 (Korean: 엘씨나인; Japanese: エルシナイン) was a 5 member boy group formed by Nega Network. They made their debut in May of 2013 with the title track "Mama Beat" which featured (then) labelmate Gain (B.E.G).

The groups lineup originally consisted of members Rasa, E.Den, J-Hyo, King, AO, and Jun. In 2014 it was announced that E.Den would be leaving the group to continue his studies.

Leader Rasa enlisted in the military in 2014 so the group made their first and final comeback with the song "East of Eden".

In 2016 it was announced by their company that the group had officially disbanded in 2015 after the member's contracts ended.
